channel.title: Error: Plymouth conflict in Debian morphing
channel.description: sudo apt install --no-install-recommends kicksecure-xfce-host - Conflict with Plymouth after entering this command when morphing Debian, MX Linux and LMDE. This error was made by me and all my friends. Today, my friend also received it. *sudo apt remove plymouth* resolves problem. Write about it in morphing instructions so that people know what to do in this situation. It seems that someone has complained about this error on this forum

item.title: Error: Plymouth conflict in Debian morphing
item.dc:creator: sam
item.description:
